text:
Follow along...

PA Governor Tom Wolf and Secretary of Health Rachel Levine ORDERED Nursing Homes to accept Coronavirus patients.

Rachel Levine REMOVED her mom from a Nursing Home to a hotel.

Your loved ones DIED due to Levine’s ORDER.

Rachel Levine’s mom was safe.

MURDER.
